HiddenText.Name: Too Scared to Talk
HiddenText.OpenningText: What if I am too scared to talk in group?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Most people are anxious about being able to talk in group. Almost without exception, within a few sessions people find that they do begin to talk in the group. The other group members understand what it is like to be new to the group, so you will most likely get a lot of support for beginning to talk in the group, particularly from the group leaders.
